named-query.name: getAllTasksEvents
named-query.query: select t from TaskEventImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllBAMTaskSummaries
named-query.query: select b from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b where b.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: deleteBAMTaskSummariesForTask
named-query.query: delete from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b where b.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: deleteAllBAMTaskSummaries
named-query.query: delete from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b

named-query.name: getAllUserAuditTasksAdmin
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where TYPE(u) = org.jbpm.services.task.audit.impl.model.UserAuditTaskImpl order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserAuditTasks
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where TYPE(u) = org.jbpm.services.task.audit.impl.model.UserAuditTaskImpl and u.actualOwner = :userId order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getUserAuditTaskById
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where u.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getGroupAuditTaskById
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g where g.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllUserAuditTasksByStatus
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where TYPE(u) = org.jbpm.services.task.audit.impl.model.UserAuditTaskImpl and u.actualOwner = :userId and u.status in :statuses order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserAuditTasksByDueDate
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where TYPE(u) = org.jbpm.services.task.audit.impl.model.UserAuditTaskImpl and u.actualOwner = :userId and u.dueDate = :dueDate order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserAuditTasksByStatusByDueDate
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where TYPE(u) = org.jbpm.services.task.audit.impl.model.UserAuditTaskImpl and u.actualOwner = :userId and u.status in :statuses and u.dueDate = :dueDate order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserAuditTasksByStatusByDueDateOptional
named-query.query: select u from UserAuditTaskImpl u where TYPE(u) = org.jbpm.services.task.audit.impl.model.UserAuditTaskImpl and u.actualOwner = :userId and u.status in :statuses and (u.dueDate = :dueDate or u.dueDate = null) order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasksAdmin
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g order by g.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasks
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g where LOCATE(:groupIds, g.potentialOwners) > 0 order by g.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasksByStatus
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g where LOCATE(:groupIds, g.potentialOwners) > 0 and g.status in :statuses order by g.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasksByDueDate
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g where LOCATE(:groupIds, g.potentialOwners) > 0 and g.dueDate = :dueDate order by g.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasksByStatusByDueDate
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g where LOCATE(:groupIds, g.potentialOwners) > 0 and g.status in :statuses and g.dueDate = :dueDate order by g.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasksByStatusByDueDateOptional
named-query.query: select g from GroupAuditTaskImpl g where LOCATE(:groupIds, g.potentialOwners) > 0 and g.status in :statuses and (g.dueDate = :dueDate or g.dueDate = null) order by g.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllHistoryAuditTasks
named-query.query: select h from HistoryAuditTaskImpl h order by h.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllHistoryAuditTasksByUser
named-query.query: select h from HistoryAuditTaskImpl h where h.actualOwner = :owner order by h.taskId DESC
